description: Detects the addition of a rule to the Windows Firewall exception list where the application resides in a suspicious folder
author: frack113
false_positives: Any legitimate application that runs from the AppData user directory
name: New Firewall Exception Rule Added For A Suspicious Folder
query: (((winlog.event_id:(2004 OR 2071) AND ApplicationPath:(/.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\.*/ OR /.*\\\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\\\.*/)) AND (NOT Action:2)) AND (NOT ((ApplicationPath:/.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Ss]\\\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\\\[Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (ApplicationPath:/.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\\\[Kk][Ee][Yy][Bb][Aa][Ss][Ee]\\\\[Kk][Ee][Yy][Bb][Aa][Ss][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (ApplicationPath:/.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ee][Nn][Gg][Ee][Rr]\\\\[Mm][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ee][Nn][Gg][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR ((ApplicationPath:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\\\.*/ AND ApplicationPath:/.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Ss]\\\\[Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Aa]\\\\.*/ AND ApplicationPath:/.*\\\\[Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))))
